page.title: 06TOURISM
page.content: The Bideford Bay Holiday Park was a house and estate known as Walland Cary.In the grounds there are 250 chalets of 4 different types,29 static caravans as well as luxury apartments and flats in the house and outbuildings.The park is open from Easter to October.Within the grounds there is a pets corner and childrens playground plus an amusements centre with various indoor games.The 2 swimming pools are heated,the outdoor one by solar panals.Although the accomodation allows for selfcatering there is a restaurant and a takeaway foodbar as well as an adults clubroom and licenced bar.There is no access directly from the park to the beach.The complex provides parttime and seasonal employment for local people.
